row.process: ! ------------------ ! Objekt definieren: ! ------------------ :SET &RUN_OBJECT# = "JOBS.BBS.DISDA_AKSTATJAHR" ! --------------------------------------- ! Bin ich am Anfang oder Ende des Monats? ! --------------------------------------- :SET &HEUTE# = SYS_LDATE("JJJJ-MM-TT") :P ">>> HEUTE = &HEUTE#" ! --------------------------------------- ! Starte die Aufgabe zwei Tage spaeter: ! --------------------------------------- :SET &START_TIME# = ADD_DAYS("JJJJ-MM-TT:&HEUTE#", 2) :SET &START_TIME# = "&START_TIME# 06:00:00" :P " -> START_TIME = &START_TIME#" :INC JOBI.RUN_OBJECT_AT_TIME_PASS_VALUES
